content: learn how to crochet a super simple **double_crochet triangle scarf or shawl** with these step-by-step photo and video tutorials *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** *for the shawl* fingering 1 super fine yarn 4 0 mm g/6 us 8 uk crochet hook tapestry needle *for the scarf* aran 4 medium yarn 6 0 mm j/10 us 4 uk crochet hook tapestry needle **yarn & yardage** **shawl** 1 cake of cotton kings sultan deluxe 1094 yds / 1000 m 250 g color blue moon 20 **scarf** 642 yds / 588 m 3 skeins of stylecraft special aran 214 yds / 196 m 100 g color gold 1709 feel free to use any comparable yarn that meets gauge **size** **shawl** 75 190 cm wide 31 79 cm deep **scarf** 67 170 cm wide 25 4 64 5 cm deep **gauge** *measure the gauge along the longest side of the triangle * **shawl** 3 row in pattern in 4 10 cm **scarf** 2 row in pattern in 4 10 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
